medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral eye redness with mild discomfort for the past 3 months.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 3 months ago with bilateral eye redness and mild discomfort. The patient denied blurring of vision, eye discharge, or preceding trauma. Initial treatment for suspected nodular anterior scleritis with ibuprofen and prednisolone did not improve the symptoms.
